summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5054 for the improvement of Erie Avenue, from East Jefferson Street to the north line of Yesler Way produced; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 58113 as amended in Section 4 by Ordinance No. 59031 several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
